comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Lookin' forward to outrunning SB in Sunshine today. Maybe. I have to overrule his call for the day's soundtrack, though. Stir a teaspoon of [this](http://listen.grooveshark.com/#/song/Killing_Floor/11525801) into your morning coffee and experience _beyond swagger_. My doctor prescribed this track and I can't believe it's over-the-counter. I'm one month into my treatment and it's amazing what a difference it's made. Even my therapist has noticed a difference. A word of caution; don't mess with it if you intend to use it at low volume. You risk a negative reaction. DU

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Too much guitar in that one...

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Sorry, guys. Missed out on my lunch hour...
